short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: WorthEPenny automatically applies the best coupon codes at checkout

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
WorthEPenny is a free browser extension that automatically finds and applies the best coupon codes at checkout. Find the best discounts on‌ ‌3,000+‌ ‌online stores and save on all your online purchases!

Install the WorthEPenny extension - it's totally free! No more searching for coupon codes and endlessly trying them... All AUTOMATIC!!! Shop like normal, just sit back and let WorthEPenny do the hard work for you. 

Save time and money with WorthEPenny: 

✔ Shop at your favorite stores as usual
✔ You'll get alerts when potential coupon codes are available
✔ Click the "Apply Coupons" button and start saving
✔ WorthEPenny automatically tests every code and applies the best discount to your cart
✔ Save on all your purchases in a few seconds

With WorthEPenny, save money immediately and shop with more confidence!
